snippet: A trial opening Monday is the latest phase in a global campaign of smartphone patent litigation whose importance goes beyond legal maneuvering.

headline.main: Apple-Samsung Patent Battle Shifts to Trial
headline.print_headline: Apple-Samsung Patent Battle Shifts to Trial

snippet: In her first couple months Laura Lang has convened senior executives to review each magazine and assess what each needs to thrive in a digital world.
abstract: Time Inc's new chief executive Laura Lang is focusing on the transition to mobile devices and the customizing of ads for marketers based on data the company collects on its magazine readers; she has convened senior executives to review each magazine and assess what each needs to thrive in a digital world.

headline.main: Time Inc.’s New Chief Rethinks Magazines for a Digital Audience
headline.print_headline: Helping Hand for a Print Empire

snippet: Data will include the July unemployment report and personal income and spending for June, and companies reporting earnings will include Chrysler, General Motors and Toyota.

headline.main: Economic Reports for the Week Ahead

snippet: Westfield Stratford City in east London has over 300 stores, including Prada and Apple, presenting contrasts to its depressed neighborhood and ideals of amateurism.
abstract: Location of the Westfield Stratford City mall in east London, which is situated at the entrance of the Olympic park, has some worried that the Olympics will be remembered as a strange new hybrid of sports appreciation and consumerism gone wild; the mall and the event grounds are so close and seamlessly connected that they could easily be confused for a single development.

headline.main: Going to the Olympics? First Event Is Mall Walking
headline.print_headline: For Spectators, the First Event Is Mall Walking

snippet: All about the origins of the phrase “making a federal case out of it” and the Chinatown gangster known as Mock Duck.
abstract: FYI column answers questions about origin of slang phrase 'making a federal case out of it' and whether there was ever a person named Mock Duck.

headline.main: Answers to Questions About New York

snippet: Cubacàn Restaurant was opened by two veteran Italian restaurateurs who realized that the spot warranted a tropical flavor.
abstract: Karla Cook reviews Cubacan restaurant in Asbury Park (Metropolitan/New Jersey).

snippet: WASHINGTON -- ''Why believe me? I'm a noted fabulist,'' says Mike Daisey, his honeyed voice all but dripping with sarcasm, eyes glinting with challenge. The audience at the Woolly Mammoth Theater here, where Mr. Daisey is performing an encore run ...
abstract: Mike Daisey's Agony and the Ecstasy of Steve Jobs returns to the stage at the Woolly Mammoth Theater in Washington, DC; controversial solo show, which exposes the dire working conditions at factories where Apple products are manufactured, ran into trouble in spring 2012 when it was discovered that some of the details and descriptions of the factories were embellished or fabricated. Photo (M)
